promptPrefix:
write long form blog posts with subheadings of the following articles:
[PROMPT]
with the conditions below:
- use emojis to emphasize important points, must include information tables if required, the result should be in markdown style, Use [TARGETLANGUAGE] in conversation that is fresh, masculine, cheerful and friendly, Use varied and unique [TARGETLANGUAGE], use Keywords in the Beginning, Middle and End Paragraphs, use keywords appropriately and not excessively, write with a unique point of view, focus on the contents of the article on the main keywords, use conjunctions, use a different title tag, also apply to the opening part of the AIDA formula, also apply the inverted pyramid technique in writing
title: 100% Rewriting Seo Friendly Articles
